notes.title: Funding
notes.p: The authors express their gratitude to the Bio-Based Industries Consortium and European Commission for the financial support to the project BARBARA: Biopolymers with advanced functionalities for building and automotive parts processed through additive manufacturing. This project received funding from the Bio-Based Industries Joint Undertaking under the European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under grant agreement No 745578.
